The Van Buren Platform Elevator
The Van Buren Platform elevator is back in service. (Updated 12:04PM)
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/HC?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
HCD Evening Rush-Hour Service Advisory.  Updated at 1:51 P.M.

Amtrak is reporting several of the switch and signal issues have been repaired.  Some platforms at Chicago Union Station remain out of service.  Metra anticipates some congestion-related delays this evening.  Thank you for your continued patience.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MED 79th, 87th, 103rd St. Station ADA Accessibility
Monday through Friday, from 9AM to 4PM, the 79th St., 87th St., and 103rd St. stations may not be fully ADA accessible due to nearby station construction.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/UP-W?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
UPW #47 - Will Not Operate
UPW train #47, scheduled to arrive Elburn at 6:13 PM will not operate past Elmhurst due to mechanical problems. Train #49 will accommodate passengers to Elburn.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/UP-W?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
UPW train #64 will not operate

UPW train #64 scheduled to depart Elburn at 6:25 pm, will not operate due to an earlier mechanical failure. Train #66 will be the next train to accommodate passengers to Ogilvie Transportation Center.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Michigan and Randolph Elevator Out of Service

The Michigan Avenue elevator located on the southwest corner of Michigan and Randolph is permanently out of service. Customers can use the South Water elevator, 225 N Michigan Avenue, or McCormick Place as an alternate boarding station.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
The 95th St/Chicago State University station will close March 3, 2025 - Station Rehab and Expansion Project

On Monday, March 3, the 95th st/Chicago State University station will close for approximately 2 years to undergo a rehabilitation and expansion project. During this time passengers should use 91st street and 103rd st/Rosemoor stations as alternates. Updates will be provided.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MED 51st Street East Elevator Out of Service
The 51st Street East elevator is out of service. Customers can use McCormick Place or 55th/56th/57th Street as alternate boarding stations.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/RI?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
RID trains delayed and resuming normal operations

Tracks have been released for train movement and will resume normal operation. RID inbound and outbound trains may be operating up to 20 minutes behind schedule and train #705 is operating with an extensive delay due to striking a pedestrian.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/RI?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Beginning May 9, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station Reconstruction

Beginning May 9, 2025, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station will be temporarily inaccessible to ADA users due to station reconstruction. Full site construction is expected to continue through Spring 2026. An accessible alternative is the 111th Street Morgan Park Station. Metra will provide updates once accessibility is restored.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/SWS?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
SWS Evening Rush-Hour Service Advisory.  Update at 1:50 P.M.

Amtrak is reporting several of the switch and signal issues have been repaired.  Some platforms at Chicago Union Station remain out of service.  Metra anticipates some congestion-related delays this evening.  Thank you for your continued patience.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/RI?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
RID #705 On The Move

RID #705, scheduled to arrive Joliet at 6:01pm, is back on the move and may be operating with an extensive delay due to an earlier pedestrian incident. Visit metratracker.com for the location of your train.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/BNSF?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
BNSF Evening Rush-Hour Service Advisory.  Updated at 1:52 P.M.

Amtrak is reporting several of the switch and signal issues have been repaired.  Some platforms at Chicago Union Station remain out of service.  Metra anticipates some congestion-related delays this evening.  Thank you for your continued patience.
